name: SaaS MVP PRD
description: Complete SaaS product with authentication, subscriptions, billing, and core feature

sections.title: Overview
sections.content: A Software-as-a-Service product providing subscription-based access to solve a specific problem for target users.

sections.title: Functional Requirements
sections.content: Authentication, subscription tiers, Stripe billing, core feature workflow, user management, team collaboration

sections.title: Non-Functional Requirements
sections.content: 99.5% uptime, PCI DSS compliance, < 200ms API response, GDPR/CCPA ready

sections.title: Business Metrics
sections.content: Track DAU, MRR, churn rate, CAC, NPS. Target: 100+ paying customers in 6 months
